get_ND_pareto(objectives_list, are_maxobjectives_list=None)[source]Â¶

Return the N-D pareto front

Parameters

  • objectives_list â list of list of objectives: example [[0,1], [1,1], [2,2]]

  • are_maxobjectives_list â for each objective, tells if they are to be maximized or not: example [True, False]. Default: False

Returns

extracted_pareto, indices: list of [x, y, â¦] points forming the pareto front, and list of the indices of these points from the base list.
